attributes.action: ask Helen Tulloch only to send out jokes which make us laugh and petition requests which support genuine causes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Helen Tulloch is a passionate lady...barely a day passes when she does not send out an email with funnies or to raise the profile of a cause.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
